verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came כִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> heard כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all הַמְּלָכִ֡ים <WH4428> And it came to pass when all the kings אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> who בְּעֵ֨בֶר <WH5676> which [were] on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֜ן <WH3383> Jordan בָּהָ֣ר <WH2022> in the hills וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֗ה <WH8219> and in the valleys וּבְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all ח֚וֹף <WH2348> and in all the coasts הַיָּ֣ם <WH3220> sea הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> of the great אֶל־ <WH413> over מ֖וּל <WH4136> over against הַלְּבָנ֑וֹן <WH3844> Lebanon הַֽחִתִּי֙ <WH2850> the Hittite וְהָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> and the Amorite הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> the Canaanite הַפְּרִזִּ֔י <WH6522> the Perizzite הַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> the Hivite וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> and the Jebusite

וַיִּֽתְקַבְּצ֣וּ <WH6908> That they gathered יַחְדָּ֔ו <WH3162> themselves together לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <WH3898> to fight עִם־ <WH5973> with יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> with Joshua וְעִם־ <WH5973> and with יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> and with Israel פֶּ֖ה <WH6310> accord אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> with one פ

וְיֹשְׁבֵ֨י <WH3427> And when the inhabitants גִבְע֜וֹן <WH1391> of Gibeon שָׁמְע֗וּ <WH8085> heard אֵת֩ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> what עָשָׂ֧ה <WH6213> had done יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> what Joshua לִֽירִיח֖וֹ <WH3405> unto Jericho וְלָעָֽי׃ <WH5857> and to Ai

וַיַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> They did work גַם־ <WH1571> also הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> like בְּעָרְמָ֔ה <WH6195> wilily וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> and set וַיִּצְטַיָּ֑רוּ <WH6737> and made as if they had been ambassadors וַיִּקְח֞וּ <WH3947> and took שַׂקִּ֤ים <WH8242> sacks בָּלִים֙ <WH1087> old לַחֲמ֣וֹרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH2543> upon their asses וְנֹאד֥וֹת <WH4997> bottles יַ֙יִן֙ <WH3196> and wine בָּלִ֔ים <WH1087> old וּמְבֻקָּעִ֖ים <WH1234> and rent וּמְצֹרָרִֽים׃ <WH6887> and bound up

וּנְעָל֨וֹת <WH5275> shoes בָּל֤וֹת <WH1087> And old וּמְטֻלָּאוֹת֙ <WH2921> and clouted בְּרַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7272> upon their feet וּשְׂלָמ֥וֹת <WH8008> garments בָּל֖וֹת <WH1087> and old עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> on וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> and all לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> upon them and all the bread צֵידָ֔ם <WH6720> meat יָבֵ֖שׁ <WH3001> was dry הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> had become נִקֻּדִֽים׃ <WH5350> [and] mouldy

וַיֵּלְכ֧וּ <WH1980> went אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> to Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> unto the camp הַגִּלְגָּ֑ל <WH1537> at Gilgal וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> and said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> about וְאֶל־ <WH413> to him אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> unto him and to the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> country רְחוֹקָה֙ <WH7350> from a far בָּ֔אנוּ <WH935> We be come וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now כִּרְתוּ־ <WH3772> now therefore make לָ֥נוּ בְרִֽית׃ <WH1285> ye a league

[וַיֹּאמְרוּ כ] (וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> answer ק) אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> And the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to הַחִוִּ֑י <WH2340> unto the Hivites אוּלַ֗י <WH194> Peradventure בְּקִרְבִּי֙ <WH7130> among אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you יוֹשֵׁ֔ב <WH3427> ye dwell וְאֵ֖יךְ <WH349> how [אֶכְרֹות־ כ] (אֶֽכְרָת־ <WH3772> make לְךָ֥ <WH3772> us and how shall we make ק) בְרִֽית׃ <WH1285> a league

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> And they said אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <WH5650> We [are] thy servants אֲנָ֑חְנוּ <WH587> we וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶ֧ם <WH413> then יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> And Joshua מִ֥י <WH4310> Who אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> are you וּמֵאַ֥יִן <WH370> unto them Who [are] ye? and from whence תָּבֹֽאוּ׃ <WH935> come

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about מֵאֶ֨רֶץ <WH776> country רְחוֹקָ֤ה <WH7350> far מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> unto him From a very בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> are come עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> thy servants לְשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> because of the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֣עְנוּ <WH8085> for we have heard שָׁמְע֔וֹ <WH8089> the fame וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> of him and all that he did בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> in Egypt

וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עָשָׂ֗ה <WH6213> And all that he did לִשְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> to the two מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> kings הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> that [were] beyond הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> Jordan לְסִיחוֹן֙ <WH5511> to Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king חֶשְׁבּ֔וֹן <WH2809> of Heshbon וּלְע֥וֹג <WH5747> and to Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> of Bashan אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בְּעַשְׁתָּרֽוֹת׃ <WH6252> which [was] at Ashtaroth

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> spake אֵלֵ֡ינוּ <WH413> about זְֽקֵינֵינוּ֩ <WH2205> Wherefore our elders וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יֹשְׁבֵ֨י <WH3427> and all the inhabitants אַרְצֵ֜נוּ <WH776> of our country לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> to us saying קְח֨וּ <WH3947> Take בְיֶדְכֶ֤ם <WH3027> with you צֵידָה֙ <WH6720> victuals לַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> for the journey וּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> and go לִקְרָאתָ֑ם <WH7125> to meet וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֤ם <WH559> them and say אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> to עַבְדֵיכֶ֣ם <WH5650> unto them We [are] your servants אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <WH587> we וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now כִּרְתוּ־ <WH3772> therefore now make לָ֥נוּ בְרִֽית׃ <WH1285> ye a league

זֶ֣ה ׀ <WH2088> This לַחְמֵ֗נוּ <WH3899> This our bread חָ֞ם <WH2525> we took hot הִצְטַיַּ֤דְנוּ <WH6679> [for] our provision אֹתוֹ֙ <WH854> out מִבָּ֣תֵּ֔ינוּ <WH1004> out of our houses בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> on the day צֵאתֵ֖נוּ <WH3318> we came forth לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> to come אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> to you וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold יָבֵ֔שׁ <WH3001> unto you but now behold it is dry וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become נִקֻּדִֽים׃ <WH5350> and it is mouldy

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> These נֹאד֤וֹת <WH4997> And these bottles הַיַּ֙יִן֙ <WH3196> of wine אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which מִלֵּ֣אנוּ <WH4390> which we filled חֲדָשִׁ֔ים <WH2319> [were] new וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> and behold הִתְבַּקָּ֑עוּ <WH1234> and behold they be rent וְאֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> and these שַׂלְמוֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH8008> and these our garments וּנְעָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5275> and our shoes בָּל֕וּ <WH1086> are become old מֵרֹ֥ב <WH7230> long הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> journey מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> by reason of the very

וַיִּקְח֥וּ <WH3947> took הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> And the men מִצֵּידָ֑ם <WH6718> of their victuals וְאֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֥י <WH6310> not [counsel] at the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> and did not שָׁאָֽלוּ׃ <WH7592> and asked

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> made לָהֶ֤ם יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> And Joshua שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> peace וַיִּכְרֹ֥ת <WH3772> with them and made לָהֶ֛ם בְּרִ֖ית <WH1285> a league לְחַיּוֹתָ֑ם <WH2421> with them to let them live וַיִּשָּׁבְע֣וּ <WH7650> sware לָהֶ֔ם נְשִׂיאֵ֖י <WH5387> and the princes הָעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> of the congregation

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came מִקְצֵה֙ <WH7097> And it came to pass at the end שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> of three יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> days אַחֲרֵ֕י <WH310> after אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> they כָּרְת֥וּ <WH3772> they had made לָהֶ֖ם בְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> a league וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֗וּ <WH8085> with them that they heard כִּי־ <WH3588> for קְרֹבִ֥ים <WH7138> that they [were] their neighbours הֵם֙ <WH1992> like אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about וּבְקִרְבּ֖וֹ <WH7130> among הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they יֹשְׁבִֽים׃ <WH3427> and [that] they dwelt

וַיִּסְע֣וּ <WH5265> journeyed בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיָּבֹ֛אוּ <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> to עָרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5892> unto their cities בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <WH7992> on the third וְעָרֵיהֶם֙ <WH5892> Now their cities גִּבְע֣וֹן <WH1391> [were] Gibeon וְהַכְּפִירָ֔ה <WH3716> and Chephirah וּבְאֵר֖וֹת <WH881> and Beeroth וְקִרְיַ֥ת יְעָרִֽים׃ <WH7157> and Kirjathjearim

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> did not הִכּוּם֙ <WH5221> smote בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because נִשְׁבְּע֤וּ <WH7650> had sworn לָהֶם֙ נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <WH5387> them not because the princes הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> of the congregation בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto them by the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּלֹּ֥נוּ <WH3885> murmured כָל־ <WH3605> and the whole הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> And all the congregation עַל־ <WH5921> against הַנְּשִׂיאִֽים׃ <WH5387> against the princes

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> said כָל־ <WH3605> all הַנְּשִׂיאִים֙ <WH5387> But all the princes אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> unto all the congregation אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <WH587> we נִשְׁבַּ֣עְנוּ <WH7650> We have sworn לָהֶ֔ם בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto them by the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> and now לֹ֥א <WH3808> not נוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> now therefore we may לִנְגֹּ֥עַ <WH5060> not touch בָּהֶֽם׃

זֹ֛את <WH2063> we נַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> This we will do לָהֶ֖ם וְהַחֲיֵ֣ה <WH2421> to them we will even let them live אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> so יִֽהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> that קֶ֔צֶף <WH7110> lest wrath עַל־ <WH5921> us הַשְּׁבוּעָ֖ה <WH7621> be upon us because of the oath אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֥עְנוּ <WH7650> which we sware לָהֶֽם׃

וַיֹּאמְר֧וּ <WH559> said אֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH413> about הַנְּשִׂיאִ֖ים <WH5387> And the princes יִֽחְי֑וּ <WH2421> unto them Let them live וַ֠יִּֽהְיוּ <WH1961> became חֹטְבֵ֨י <WH2404> but let them be hewers עֵצִ֤ים <WH6086> of wood וְשֹֽׁאֲבֵי־ <WH7579> and drawers מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> of water לְכָל־ <WH3605> the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> unto all the congregation כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after דִּבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> had promised לָהֶ֖ם הַנְּשִׂיאִֽים׃ <WH5387> as the princes

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> called לָהֶם֙ יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> And Joshua וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> for them and he spake אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> to לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> unto them saying לָמָּה֩ <WH4100> Why רִמִּיתֶ֨ם <WH7411> Wherefore have ye beguiled אֹתָ֜נוּ <WH853> לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> us saying רְחוֹקִ֨ים <WH7350> far אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves מִכֶּם֙ <WH4480> We מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> We [are] very וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you בְּקִרְבֵּ֥נוּ <WH7130> among יֹשְׁבִֽים׃ <WH3427> from you when ye dwell

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> Now אֲרוּרִ֣ים <WH779> Now therefore ye [are] cursed אַתֶּ֑ם <WH859> and you וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall never יִכָּרֵ֨ת <WH3772> and there shall none of you be freed מִכֶּ֜ם <WH4480> being עֶ֗בֶד <WH5650> from being bondmen וְחֹטְבֵ֥י <WH2404> and hewers עֵצִ֛ים <WH6086> of wood וְשֹֽׁאֲבֵי־ <WH7579> and drawers מַ֖יִם <WH4325> of water לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> for the house אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> of my God

וַיַּעֲנ֨וּ <WH6030> And they answered אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> Joshua וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> and said כִּי֩ <WH3588> Because הֻגֵּ֨ד <WH5046> Because it was certainly הֻגַּ֤ד <WH5046> told לַעֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5650> thy servants אֵת֩ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֜ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> how that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> Moses עַבְדּ֔וֹ <WH5650> his servant לָתֵ֤ת <WH5414> to give לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> you all the land וּלְהַשְׁמִ֛יד <WH8045> and to destroy אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> all the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> from before וַנִּירָ֨א <WH3372> afraid מְאֹ֤ד <WH3966> you therefore we were sore לְנַפְשֹׁתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5315> of our lives מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> because וַֽנַּעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> of you and have done אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> Now הִנְנ֣וּ <WH2005> are in בְיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> [are] in thine hand כַּטּ֨וֹב <WH2896> good וְכַיָּשָׁ֧ר <WH3477> and right בְּעֵינֶ֛יךָ <WH5869> as it seemeth לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> unto thee to do לָ֖נוּ עֲשֵֽׂה׃ <WH6213> unto us do
